  • Method Details

    • makeABankTransaction

      public BankTransaction makeABankTransaction(Account account, String iban, String swiftCode, @Nullable String description, float amount)
      This method creates a bank transaction and saves it in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - is the account from which you take the money.
      iban - is the iban to which you transfer the money.
      swiftCode - is the associated swift code.
      description - is a optional description.
      amount - is the amount of the bank transaction.
      Returns:
      a bank transaction object and saves it in the database. (No real bank transactions are made yet)

    • saveBankTransaction

      private BankTransaction saveBankTransaction(BankTransaction bankTransaction)
      This method saves a bank transaction object in the database.
      Parameters:
      bankTransaction - is the bank transaction object you wnt to save into the database.
      Returns:
      the bank transaction object passed but updated with the proper id attributes, that the database assigned to your db entry.
